app.name: Street Fighter 3
app.author: R-Sam based on RetroArch
app.long_description:
One-click run Street Fighter III - New Generation.
Channel Forwarders are stored in sd:/wad/sfiii.
Website: https://github.com/R-Sam-1980/cps3
- GameID: 800706 - Developer & Publisher: Capcom - Genre: Fight / Versus - Released: 1997 - Players: 2

arguments.arg: sd:/Games/Arcade (FB Alpha 2012 CPS-3)/Street Fighter III - New Generation
